Digital Media Account Security, Protecti: Digital Media Account Security, Protection, and Recovery Solutions
Comprehensive security and recovery solu: Comprehensive security and recovery solutions for all your digital media accounts. We protect against breaches, restore compromised profiles, and ensure your online presence remains safe and uninterrupted.
Real Estate Virality Engine: Make Projec: Real Estate Virality Engine: Make Projects Go from 0 to Hero
One place to access every visibility ser: One place to access every visibility service needed to build hype, trust, and virality for any real estate project. The platform enables developers to get placements across verified news outlets, media channels, real estate influencers, power lists, awards, paparazzi buzz creators, and podcast/radio opportunities.
Write content without requiring professi: Write content without requiring professional writing skills, while adhering to each media platform’s guidelines to expedite publishing. The content will be optimized for generative AI engines like ChatGPT and for maximum search visibility (Search Everywhere Optimization).

Unlock an additional income opportunity:: Unlock an additional income opportunity: simply refer VaaS Solutions to your network for visibility services. Share the lead details and earn a lifetime referral bonus each time your referral places an order with VaaS Solutions.
Brand-Safe Creator Partnerships. Connect: Brand-Safe Creator Partnerships. Connecting Global, Regional, National, and Local Creators with the Right Brands
A structured marketplace connecting cele: A structured marketplace connecting celebrity, macro, micro, and women-led creators with aligned brands, using data-driven discovery to enable authentic, compliant, performance-focused collaborations across platforms and regional markets.
A structured distribution framework enab: A structured distribution framework enabling region-first video and editorial dissemination through bloggers, YouTubers, Instagrammers, TikTokers, vloggers, and independent creators across social media platforms. The model follows principles similar to traditional press distribution via newspapers and digital publications, adapted for influencer-led channels with regional relevance and platform adherence.

© 2026 Visibility as a Service (VaaS) So: © 2026 Visibility as a Service (VaaS) Solutions. All rights reserved.
Important Points to Help You Decide: Important Points to Help You Decide
Find answers to frequently asked questio: Find answers to frequently asked questions about News Marketplace services, guaranteed publications, pricing, and media placement. Get all your questions answered.
Our guaranteed publication service ensur: Our guaranteed publication service ensures that your content will be published in the selected media outlets within the agreed timeframe. Unlike traditional PR methods, we provide a 100% publication guarantee with transparent pricing and no hidden fees.
In Which Media Outlets Can You Place Mat: In Which Media Outlets Can You Place Materials?
We have access to thousands of reputable: We have access to thousands of reputable publications from top news outlets (Forbes, Business Insider, TechCrunch) to niche platforms in different countries. Our network spans across North America, Europe, Asia, and the Middle East, covering both mainstream and industry-specific publications.
What Is the Difference Between PR Throug: What Is the Difference Between PR Through the Editorial Office and Guaranteed Publications?
Traditional PR through editorial offices: Traditional PR through editorial offices involves pitching stories to journalists with no guarantee of publication. Our guaranteed publication service provides certainty - you pay for confirmed placement in selected media outlets, ensuring your content reaches the target audience without the uncertainty of traditional PR methods.
How Much Does It Cost and What Does the: How Much Does It Cost and What Does the Price Depend on?
Pricing depends on several factors inclu: Pricing depends on several factors including the publication's reach, authority, topic relevance, and content length. Prices typically range from $500 to $5,000+ per article, depending on the outlet's prestige and your specific requirements. We provide transparent pricing with no hidden costs.
Publication timelines vary by outlet, ty: Publication timelines vary by outlet, typically ranging from 3-7 business days for standard placements to 2-4 weeks for premium publications. We provide specific timelines for each outlet during the selection process and keep you updated throughout the publication process.
Can I Choose Specific Media Outlets Myse: Can I Choose Specific Media Outlets Myself?
Yes, you control the choice of platforms: Yes, you control the choice of platforms yourself. The platform displays a list of available media outlets with prices and parameters. You can select specific publications based on your target audience, industry, geographic reach, and budget requirements.
We offer various publication formats inc: We offer various publication formats including articles, interviews, opinion pieces, case studies, press releases, and sponsored content. Each format is optimized for the specific publication and your content goals.
How Do You Guarantee That the Article Wi: How Do You Guarantee That the Article Will Be Published Exactly as Agreed?
We have established relationships with p: We have established relationships with publications and use proven processes to ensure content is published as agreed. This includes content approval workflows, direct relationships with editorial teams, and quality control measures. Any deviations are addressed immediately.
What Happens If the Publication Does not: What Happens If the Publication Does not Come out?
In the rare event that a publication doe: In the rare event that a publication doesn't occur as guaranteed, we provide a full refund or republish in an equivalent or better outlet at no additional cost. Our track record shows 99.9% success rate in meeting publication commitments.
Is the Service Suitable for Startups and: Is the Service Suitable for Startups and Small Businesses?
Absolutely! Our service is designed to b: Absolutely! Our service is designed to be accessible for businesses of all sizes. We offer flexible pricing, payment plans, and can create content specifically tailored for startups and small businesses looking to build credibility and reach.
Can Publications Be Targeted by Region o: Can Publications Be Targeted by Region or Language?
Yes, we offer geo-targeted and language-: Yes, we offer geo-targeted and language-specific publication options. Whether you need coverage in specific countries, regions, or languages, we can target publications that reach your desired audience demographics.
Will the Materials Be Marked as \"Advert: Will the Materials Be Marked as "Advertisement" or "Sponsored"?
Our standard publications appear as edit: Our standard publications appear as editorial content, not advertisements. However, some publications may include disclaimers based on their editorial policies. We always clarify disclosure requirements upfront so there are no surprises.
How Is the Effectiveness of Publications: How Is the Effectiveness of Publications Measured?
We provide detailed analytics including: We provide detailed analytics including publication links, traffic data, social media engagement, backlink profiles, and SEO impact. For premium packages, we include comprehensive reporting on reach, engagement, and ROI metrics.
Can I Order a Series of Publications for: Can I Order a Series of Publications for a PR Campaign?
Yes, we specialize in coordinated PR cam: Yes, we specialize in coordinated PR campaigns with multiple publications across different outlets. This approach builds momentum and maximizes your content's reach and impact over time.
I Don't Have Any Important News, How Can: I Don't Have Any Important News, How Can I Promote Myself?
We help create newsworthy content from y: We help create newsworthy content from your expertise, achievements, and industry insights. Our content strategists work with you to develop compelling narratives that position you or your company as thought leaders in your field.
How Is Medialister Different from a PR A: How Is Medialister Different from a PR Agency?
Unlike traditional PR agencies that pitc: Unlike traditional PR agencies that pitch stories with uncertain outcomes, Medialister provides guaranteed publication with transparent pricing. We eliminate the guesswork and provide measurable results, making content marketing predictable and reliable.

The platform connects clients with credible visibility solutions, ensuring maximum reach and impact for their vision and objectives.

about.heroDesc: We're revolutionizing digital publishing by connecting content creators with global audiences through innovative, transparent, and efficient platforms.
about.features.premiumContentDesc: Access high-quality, verified news content from trusted sources worldwide.
about.features.globalCommunityDesc: Connect with writers, editors, and readers from across the globe.
about.features.verifiedPublishingDesc: Guaranteed publication with transparent pricing and quality assurance.
about.whyChooseUsDesc: Discover the features that make News MarketPlace the preferred platform for content creators worldwide.
about.ourMissionDesc: To democratize publishing by providing creators with the tools, platform, and audience they need to share their stories with the world. We believe in transparent, fair, and accessible media for everyone.

powerList.joinEliteDesc: Want to be featured in our Power List? Join the ranks of industry leaders and innovators who are shaping the future of media and publishing.
powerList.recognitionDesc: Get recognized as a leader in your field
powerList.networkingDesc: Connect with industry leaders and peers
articles.aiAlt: AI-generated article on News Marketplace platform showcasing innovative content creation
articles.description: Fresh perspectives, practical guides, and industry analysis — crafted for creators and publishers.
cookie.title: Cookie Preferences
cookie.desc: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.
cookie.necessaryDesc: Required for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.
cookie.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookieData.title: Cookie Data Overview
cookieData.desc: View cookie preferences, tracking data, and privacy information.
cookieData.name: Name
cookieData.adminOnly: This page is only accessible to administrators.
events.pageDesc: Discover and register for upcoming events in the news and media industry.
privacy.heroDesc: We've redesigned our policy to be as transparent as our journalism. No legalese. Just the truth.
privacy.sections.collect.title: What We Collect
privacy.sections.collect.question: What do we know about you?
privacy.sections.collect.content: We believe in minimalism. We only collect what's absolutely necessary to deliver your news: your basic profile (name, email) and your reading preferences to tailor the feed. No hidden trackers, no creeping.
privacy.sections.usage.title: How We Use It
privacy.sections.usage.question: Why do we need it?
privacy.sections.usage.content: Your data fuels the engine. It helps us recommend the 'Technology' articles you love and skip the 'Sports' ones you don't. It also processes your premium subscriptions and keeps your account secure.
privacy.sections.security.title: Security Measures
privacy.sections.security.question: Is it safe with us?
privacy.sections.security.content: We treat your data like a vault. With military-grade AES-256 encryption and continuous security audits, your information is locked away from prying eyes. We hire white-hat hackers to test us regularly.
privacy.sections.control.title: Your Control
privacy.sections.control.question: Who is in charge?
privacy.sections.control.content: You are. Always. You can download every byte of data we have on you, correct it, or nuke it completely from our servers with a single click. No questions asked. No 'retention periods'.
cookie.heroDesc: We believe you should control your digital footprint. This dashboard explains exactly what cookies we use and gives you the knowledge to manage them.
cookie.essential.title: Essential Cookies
cookie.essential.desc: Strictly necessary for the site to function (e.g., login status, security keys). You cannot opt-out of these.
cookie.performance.title: Analytics & Performance
cookie.performance.desc: Helps us understand how you use the site so we can make it better. Data is anonymous and aggregated.
cookie.marketing.title: Marketing & Ads
cookie.marketing.desc: Used by third-parties to serve relevant ads to you on other platforms. If disabled, ads will be less relevant.
cookie.footerNote: * This is a visual guide. To actually change your preferences, please check your browser settings or the popup consent manager.
cookie.manageDesc: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. You can switch off cookies at any time, but remember that this may disable some features of our website.
cookie.durationDesc: Some cookies are "session cookies" which are deleted when you close your browser. Others are "persistent" and stay until they expire or you delete them.
cookie.thirdPartyDesc: We may use trusted third-party services (like Google Analytics) which may also set cookies on your device during your visit.
refund.heroDesc: We keep it simple. If something goes wrong, we fix it. Here are the rules of engagement.
refund.sections.eligibility.title: Eligibility
refund.sections.eligibility.question: When can I get a refund?
refund.sections.eligibility.content: We believe in fair play. You are entitled to a refund if we completely fail to deliver the agreed service, if there's a technical error like a double charge, or if you cancel before our team starts working on your order.
refund.sections.nonRefundable.title: Non-Refundable
refund.sections.nonRefundable.question: What is final sale?
refund.sections.nonRefundable.content: Some actions are irreversible. Once an article is published live, a marketing campaign has started, or an order is older than 30 days, we cannot offer a refund as resources have already been irrevocably allocated.
refund.sections.timeline.title: Timeline
refund.sections.timeline.question: How long does it take?
refund.sections.timeline.content: We don't hold your money hostage. Once you submit a request with your Order ID, we verify the details within 48 hours. If approved, the banking system typically reflects the refund in your account within 7-10 business days.
refund.sections.contact.title: Contact
refund.sections.contact.question: Still have questions?
refund.sections.contact.content: Every case is unique. If you believe your situation warrants an exception or if you're just unsure, our support team is here to listen. We approach every request with a human touch.
terms.heroDesc: Clear guidelines for a transparent partnership. No hidden clauses, just straightforward business.
terms.serviceRestrictionsDesc: Vital limitations to be aware of before proceeding.
terms.point1.title: Order Processing & Cancellation Policy
terms.point1.content: The following points may appear detailed, but they are designed to ensure smooth execution, timely delivery, and complete clarity — eliminating back-and-forth communication between the publication, our team, agency partners, and end clients. These guidelines help save time and effort for all parties involved.
terms.point2.title: Payment Terms
terms.point2.content: Orders, once placed, cannot be cancelled or rejected. All payments must be made in advance. Pricing is quoted in USDT. If payment is made via bank transfer, an additional 7.5% will be added to the listed price.
terms.point3.title: Content Guidelines - Hyperlinks & Images
terms.point3.content: One hyperlink is allowed per article and may direct to a project website, company website, or social media profile. One image is allowed per article, which must be in landscape orientation. Portrait images will not be accepted. The image must not contain logos, thumbnails, web banners, homepage creatives, or any promotional branding.
terms.point4.title: Editorial Discretion - Sub-headings & Bylines
terms.point4.content: Sub-headings or sub-titles are not guaranteed. If included and not approved by the editor, they may be removed without prior notice. Byline or author name is also not guaranteed. Publications may choose to publish under their editorial team name, consider the suggested name, or omit it entirely. Such decisions are at the sole discretion of the publication and may occur without notification. The inclusion of personal or company names in the article title is not guaranteed. Efforts will be made to accommodate the request, but confirmation will only be shared prior to publication.
terms.point5.title: Content Revision Policy
terms.point5.content: Published articles cannot be revised in any manner. However, if there is any misalignment or deviation in wording from the originally submitted content, it must be reported within 24 hours from the time the live link is shared. Post that window, no changes will be accepted. If a published article needs to be taken down, this is treated as a separate service, chargeable on a case-by-case basis. A formal request must be submitted on the requesting party's official letterhead, along with a valid government-issued ID of the authorized person requesting the takedown.
terms.point6.title: Prohibited Content Categories
terms.point6.content: Content related to geopolitics, gambling, adult material, CBD, drugs, alcohol, nudity, speculative topics, or any associated industries is strictly prohibited and will not be sent for review, approval, or publication. Content in the form of thought leadership, editorials, interviews, Q&A, opinion pieces, or personal branding is not accepted under standard terms. Some publications may consider such content at a different rate with separate terms and conditions, based on case-by-case evaluation.
terms.point7.title: Content Structure Restrictions
terms.point7.content: Articles must not be structured around or contain titles that reflect the '6W1H' approach — what, where, when, why, who, whom, or how. Press releases involving partnerships, funding, MoUs, and similar announcements must be supported by formal documentation. Any article claiming guaranteed income, trading/project-based returns, or any self-declared millionaire, multi-millionaire, or billionaire status must also be backed by verifiable, formal evidence. Without this, content will not be submitted for editorial review.
terms.point8.title: Industry-Specific Pricing
terms.point8.content: Pricing for industries such as Web3 (crypto, blockchain, NFTs, etc.) and real estate (interior design, architecture, construction, proptech, real estate marketing, etc.) is different from standard sectors. Web3 content must be supported by formal evidence for all factual or financial claims to be considered for publishing.
terms.point9.title: Publication Grade Variations
terms.point9.content: With the exception of payment terms, most guidelines apply to Grade A+ and Grade A publications. Grade C publications are more flexible and carry fewer editorial restrictions. We are not responsible for content published on Grade C category publications, as they are merely websites not approved by any competent media authority, and they may directly approach your clients.
terms.point10.title: Service Scope - Digital Publishing
terms.point10.content: The listed price includes digital publishing only. It does not include social media amplification or print exposure unless explicitly stated otherwise in writing.
terms.point11.title: Turnaround Time Calculation
terms.point11.content: All turnaround times are calculated based on official working days in GCC countries, aligned with their respective banking workweeks. Any content submitted after 2:00 PM (local time) will be considered as submitted on the next working day.
terms.point12.title: Social Media Integration
terms.point12.content: Embedding social media posts (such as from Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, or YouTube) within article content is available at an additional cost, subject to approval by the publication. Similarly, posting the article on the respective publication's official social media platforms is possible at extra cost.
terms.point13.title: Listicle Content Restrictions
terms.point13.content: Articles written in listicle format or those containing terms such as 'Top,' 'Best,' 'Emerging,' or other ranking-based headlines or power lists are not permitted under standard publishing terms.
terms.point14.title: Publication-Specific Guidelines
terms.point14.content: For publication-specific guidelines, please reach out via email (thesheikhmedia@gmail.com) or Telegram (VisibilityExperts) for the most accurate and updated information.
terms.point15.title: Terms Review & Updates
terms.point15.content: This list is reviewed and updated on a monthly basis. However, in rare cases, some pricing or terms may not reflect the most current information due to delays or exceptional circumstances. In such cases, updated terms and pricing will be shared upon request or on a case-by-case or transactional basis.
terms.point16.title: Client Confidentiality & Direct Engagement
terms.point16.content: There is no direct engagement with end clients. No third-party agency is used for content publishing except for publications related to the West and Asia. This ensures complete trust, reliability, and service integrity. As a result of this model, previously published article links cannot be shared directly to protect the confidentiality of our partner agencies' client data. Reference links can, however, be provided for validation. The most credible testimony to our work comes from the partner agencies and the publications themselves. For those familiar with the industry or region, it is recommended to reach out to these entities for feedback and validation, rather than requesting direct testimonials from our side.
terms.point17.title: Competitive Pricing Guarantee
terms.point17.content: If a lower price is found in the market for the same content, same publication, and same section, a 5% additional discount will be offered, provided complete formal proof of the competing offer is submitted for verification.
terms.point18.title: Additional Services - Social Media & Digital Media
terms.point18.content: In addition to media publications, we also offer a range of social media and digital media services with a guarantee—subject to representative availability and service status at the time of request. Please refer tab 'Additional Guaranteed Services'
terms.point19.title: Service Availability
terms.point19.content: In addition to media publications, we also offer a range of social media and digital media services with a guarantee—subject to representative availability and the service being active at the time of request. Please refer to the tab titled 'Additional Guaranteed Services.' These services are unique and exclusive, and are not officially provided by the companies that own the respective social media platforms. They are carried out by experienced and skilled representatives using available forms, emails, or other methods, the specifics of which may not be fully disclosed to us.
terms.point20.title: Press Distribution Services
terms.point20.content: Apart from Gulf region (GCC) media services, we also offer press distribution services through our partner network. Please note that these may not be guaranteed to index on Google and might include our partner agency's name in the footer. Additionally, they may carry labels such as 'sponsored', 'supplied by', 'partner content', 'brand view', 'network', or 'disclaimer'. For specific details, please contact us via email (thesheikhmedia@gmail.com) or Telegram (VisibilityExperts).
terms.point21.title: Global Publication Access
terms.point21.content: Apart from Gulf region or GCC media services, we can source almost all major publications and newspapers from across the globe—including the USA, India, Europe, the UK, the Middle East, and more—through our partner network. For specific details, please contact us via email (thesheikhmedia@gmail.com) or Telegram (VisibilityExperts). Kindly note that we do not share lists unless we are an official partner of the respective media house.
terms.point22.title: Intellectual Property Rights
terms.point22.content: All names, logos, websites, trademarks, registered marks, etc., are the official properties of their respective media houses and are mentioned here for reference purposes only.
terms.point23.title: Refund Policy
terms.point23.content: In the event any service is not fulfilled, the advance payment will be fully processed within Seven (7) working days for all the services except social media related services where the payment will be processed within two (2) working days through the original payment method.
terms.point24.title: Publication Grading System
terms.point24.content: Grading is based on our real-time experience, tracking, trends, and the information available to our team. This grading is solely for internal reference and is not intended for publication, nor is it meant to harm, devalue, or misrepresent any organization. Our intention is to equip our agency partners with comprehensive information and access to the widest possible range of brands in one place—so they can avoid spending valuable time searching for publications across multiple sources.
terms.point25.title: Pricing Applicability
terms.point25.content: These rates are only applicable if the existing company is not working with any agency or directly with the publisher
terms.point26.title: Pricing Updates
terms.point26.content: These rates may change anytime without any prior intimation
terms.point27.title: Content Archival
terms.point27.content: Publications are guaranteed to be on website for twelve (12) months
terms.point28.title: Client Representation
terms.point28.content: We will use the name of the company as our client in our platforms
terms.restrictions.4: No post on social media or newsletter
terms.restrictions.5: No social media embedded is allowed
terms.restrictions.6: Not placed in home page, place in relevant section
trademark.heroDesc: Protecting our brand identity and respecting the intellectual property of others. The rules of the creative road.
trademark.sections.respect.title: Respect for IP
trademark.sections.respect.content: We respect the intellectual property rights of others and expect our users to do the same. This Trademark Policy outlines our rules regarding the use of our trademarks and the trademarks of others on our platform.
trademark.sections.ourTrademarks.title: Our Trademarks
trademark.sections.ourTrademarks.content: The News Marketplace name, logo, and any other product or service names or slogans contained in our services are trademarks of News Marketplace and its suppliers or licensors, and may not be copied, imitated, or used, in whole or in part, without the prior written permission of News Marketplace or the applicable trademark holder.
trademark.sections.thirdParty.title: Third-Party Trademarks
trademark.sections.thirdParty.content: All other trademarks, registered trademarks, product names, and company names or logos mentioned in our services are the property of their respective owners. Reference to any products, services, processes, or other information, by trade name, trademark, manufacturer, supplier, or otherwise does not constitute or imply endorsement, sponsorship, or recommendation thereof by us.
trademark.sections.infringement.title: Infringement Claims
trademark.sections.infringement.content: If you believe that your trademark is being used on our platform in a way that constitutes trademark infringement, please contact us with the specific details of your claim, including the trademark registration number and the location of the infringing content.
trademark.sections.assets.title: Brand Asset Usage
trademark.sections.assets.content: You may use our official brand assets only with our permission and in accordance with our brand guidelines. Do not modify, alter, or distort our logos or use them in a confusing or misleading manner.
dataProtection.heroDesc: Security isn't a feature; it's our foundation. We treat your personal data with the same rigor as financial assets.
dataProtection.sections.stewardship.cont: News Marketplace acts as the primary custodian (Data Controller) of your information. We don't just store data; we govern its ethical use, determining strictly 'why' and 'how' it serves your experience.
dataProtection.sections.legal.title: Legal Framework
dataProtection.sections.legal.subtitle: Processing Basis
dataProtection.sections.legal.content: We never process data in a vacuum. Every byte processed rests on a solid legal pillar: your explicit consent, contractual necessity, statutory obligation, or a verified legitimate interest that never overrides your fundamental rights.
dataProtection.sections.rights.title: Your Data Bill of Rights
dataProtection.sections.rights.subtitle: Empowerment
dataProtection.sections.rights.content: You are not a passive subject. You hold the power to Access your files, Rectify errors, Erase your history ('Right to be Forgotten'), Restrict active processing, and Port your data to other services. These aren't just features; they are your legal entitlements.
dataProtection.sections.retention.title: Retention Lifecycle
dataProtection.sections.retention.conten: Data has an expiration date. We adhere to strict retention schedules, keeping personal information only for the exact duration required to fulfill the user's specific request or legal mandate, after which it is securely purged.
dataProtection.sections.transfers.title: Global Transfers
dataProtection.sections.transfers.conten: In a connected world, data travels. When we transfer your information across borders, we wrap it in a layer of legal protection—Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs)—ensuring that your privacy rights remain intact, regardless of geography.
reselling.heroDesc: A comprehensive guide for agencies and partners. Clear terms for a transparent and profitable partnership.
reselling.points.overview.title: Agreement Overview
reselling.points.overview.content: This Reselling Agreement governs the terms under which partners, agencies, and authorized resellers may resell our publication and media services to their clients. It serves as the foundational framework for our commercial relationship.
reselling.points.authorized.title: Authorized Reseller Status
reselling.points.authorized.content: To become an authorized reseller, you must apply and be approved by our partnership team. Resellers are independent contractors and not employees, agents, or partners of News Marketplace in a legal sense.
reselling.points.pricing.title: Pricing and Margins
reselling.points.pricing.content: Resellers are provided with wholesale pricing or discount structures as defined in their partnership tier. Resellers are free to set their own retail pricing for their clients, provided they do not misrepresent the service value or features.
reselling.points.whiteLabel.title: White Labeling
reselling.points.whiteLabel.content: Unless otherwise specified, services are provided on a white-label basis. Resellers may present the reports and proofs of publication under their own brand. However, they must not claim ownership of the underlying media outlets or trademarks belonging to the publishers.
reselling.points.confidentiality.title: Client Confidentiality
reselling.points.confidentiality.content: We respect the reseller-client relationship. We will not solicit your clients directly. All communication regarding the order will be conducted through the reseller, ensuring complete privacy and trust in your client relationships.
reselling.points.obligations.title: Reseller Obligations
reselling.points.obligations.content: Resellers are responsible for ensuring their clients comply with our Content Guidelines and Terms & Conditions. Resellers must not knowingly submit prohibited content. Resellers handle all first-line support and billing for their clients.
reselling.points.termination.title: Termination
reselling.points.termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate the reseller agreement if the reseller violates these terms, engages in fraudulent activity, or conducts business in a way that damages our reputation or relationships with publishers.
about.sections.vision.title: Vision
about.sections.vision.content: Our goal is to become the world’s most trusted media marketplace, where high-quality services meet the best pricing. We envision a future where publishing is democratized, accessible, and profitable for all stakeholders in the media ecosystem.
about.sections.ourVision.title: Our Vision
about.sections.ourVision.content: To revolutionize visibility requirements by connecting creators, businesses, media outlets, brands, companies, influencers, and marketing professionals through innovative, transparent, and efficient platforms. VaaS Solutions bridge the gap between traditional media and modern digital needs, ensuring every voice is heard and every story is told.
about.sections.whatWeDo.title: What VaaS Solutions Do
about.sections.whatWeDo.content: VaaS Solutions provides comprehensive omnichannel media, corporate communication, marketing, and PR solutions, including article publishing, press releases, content distribution, and digital marketing services. The platform connects clients with credible visibility solutions, ensuring maximum reach and impact for their vision and objectives.
about.sections.whyUs.title: Why VaaS Solutions
about.sections.whyUs.content: With years of the founder’s experience across multiple industries, we understand the nuances of visibility. Our team comprises media professionals, content strategists, and technology experts who work together to deliver exceptional results for all the stakeholders.
about.sections.commitment.title: Stakeholder Commitment
about.sections.commitment.content: We uphold the highest standards in service delivery, ensuring every requirement meets best-in-class benchmarks. Our commitment ensures that all partners—suppliers, clients, and collaborators—receive maximum value for their time and efforts.
about.sections.network.title: Global Network
about.sections.network.content: VaaS Solutions’ network spans continents, connecting clients with top-tier media outlets and creators across the Middle East, North America, Europe, and Asia. This global reach ensures that our partners’ vision and mission receive the international and regional exposure they deserve.
about.sections.tech.title: Innovation and Technology
about.sections.tech.content: We leverage cutting-edge technology to streamline the publishing process, from content submission to publication tracking. Our platform features real-time analytics, automated workflows, and AI-powered content optimization tools.
about.sections.success.title: Client Success
about.sections.success.content: Our success is measured by our clients' success. We provide dedicated support, transparent communication, and measurable results. Every client relationship is built on trust, reliability, and mutual growth.
about.hero.desc: We are building the infrastructure for the next generation of digital visibility. Here is what drives us forward.
services.hero.title: The Content Workflow.
services.hero.desc: From creation to distribution and analysis. One seamless process.
services.steps.creation.desc: Professional writing and content creation services with AI assistance for superior quality.
services.steps.publishing.desc: Complete publishing and distribution solutions designed for maximum reach and engagement.
services.steps.analytics.desc: Data-driven insights and performance tracking tools for making informed business decisions.

csr.philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
csr.philosophy.content: At News Marketplace, we believe in giving back to the community and promoting sustainable practices. Our Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives focus on education, environmental protection, and supporting underserved communities.

howItWorks.seo.title: How It Works | News Marketplace
howItWorks.seo.desc: A simple, transparent guide to using our news marketplace.
howItWorks.hero.desc: Everything you need to know about connecting with the world's best journalism.
howItWorks.steps.1.title: Register & Verify
howItWorks.steps.1.desc: Begin your journey by creating a secure account. We verify every member—journalists and consumers alike—to ensure a trusted environment.
howItWorks.steps.2.title: Browse & Discover
howItWorks.steps.2.desc: Access a curated feed of verified news. Use our smart filters to find exclusive stories, breaking news, or deep-dive investigations.
howItWorks.steps.3.title: Purchase & Access
howItWorks.steps.3.desc: Seamlessly unlock content with our secure payment system. Buy single articles or subscribe to your favorite creators directly.
howItWorks.steps.4.title: Engage & Review
howItWorks.steps.4.desc: Join the conversation. Rate stories, follow journalists, and contribute to a healthier news ecosystem with your feedback.
howItWorks.faq.title: Common Questions
howItWorks.faq.1.a: Our automated systems handle basic verification instantly. Professional journalist credential verification typically takes 24-48 hours ensuring the highest quality standards.
howItWorks.faq.2.a: Absolutely. We partner with industry-leading payment processors that comply with PCI DSS level 1 standards. We never store your raw credit card details.
howItWorks.faq.3.a: Yes, you have full control. You can cancel any subscription instantly from your dashboard with no hidden fees or penalties.
howItWorks.cta.title: Still have questions?

mediaPartnerships.hero.desc: Partner with us to reach our engaged audience through strategic media collaborations and brand partnerships.

mediaPartnerships.types.brand.title: Brand Partnerships
mediaPartnerships.types.brand.desc: Collaborate with brands for co-branded content, sponsored articles, and integrated marketing campaigns that resonate with our audience.
mediaPartnerships.types.content.title: Content Marketing
mediaPartnerships.types.content.desc: Create compelling content together through guest posts, sponsored content, and thought leadership articles.
mediaPartnerships.types.event.title: Event Sponsorship
mediaPartnerships.types.event.desc: Sponsor our events, webinars, and virtual summits to connect with industry leaders and decision-makers.
mediaPartnerships.types.buying.title: Media Buying
mediaPartnerships.types.buying.desc: Reach our targeted audience through strategic media buying and advertising placements across our platforms.

mediaPartnerships.types.influencer.desc: Partner with our network of influencers and thought leaders for authentic brand endorsements and collaborations.

mediaPartnerships.types.affiliate.desc: Join our affiliate program to earn commissions by promoting our content and driving traffic to your business.

mediaPartnerships.benefits.audience.desc: Our audience consists of industry professionals, decision-makers, and engaged readers who actively consume and share content.
mediaPartnerships.benefits.results.title: Proven Results
mediaPartnerships.benefits.results.desc: Our partnerships have delivered measurable results with increased brand awareness, lead generation, and ROI for our partners.
mediaPartnerships.benefits.expert.title: Expert Team
mediaPartnerships.benefits.expert.desc: Work with our experienced team of content creators, marketers, and media professionals who understand your industry.
mediaPartnerships.benefits.reach.title: Multi-Platform Reach
mediaPartnerships.benefits.reach.desc: Extend your reach across our website, social media channels, newsletters, and partner networks.
mediaPartnerships.benefits.turnaround.de: Quick campaign setup and execution with dedicated account management and regular performance reporting.
mediaPartnerships.benefits.reporting.des: Clear metrics, detailed analytics, and comprehensive reporting to track the success of your partnership campaigns.

mediaPartnerships.ready.desc: Contact our partnerships team to discuss collaboration opportunities and explore how we can work together to achieve your marketing goals.
mediaPartnerships.labels.proTipDesc: Mention your specific partnership goals in your inquiry for faster response!

affiliate.hero.desc: Passive income is always better when it comes without investment, use your network to grow your net worth. Once the form is submitted, we will share the referral code, ask your network to always mention the referral code while placing an order.

mySubmissions.title: My Submissions
mySubmissions.subtitle: View all your article submissions and their status

popups.error: Failed to submit article. Please try again.

hero.title: AI Article Questionnaire
hero.desc: Fill out the questionnaire below to generate an AI-powered article tailored to your needs.

popup.title: Important Information
popup.desc: Please read the following instructions carefully before proceeding.

why.title: Why this questionnaire?
why.1: It helps us understand your brand.
why.2: It ensures the content meets your goals.
why.3: It provides context for the AI.
why.4: It saves time in the long run.

download.title: Download Questionnaire
download.desc: You can also download the questionnaire as a Word document.

submission.title: Submission Options
submission.emailDesc: You can email the completed questionnaire to

format.title: Article Format
format.desc: Please choose from one of the options below:

questions.name: What is the name of the person(s) and/or brand these articles are for?
questions.preferredTitle: Do you have a preferred title (producer, rapper, influencer, etc.) that you'd like us to use?
questions.background: What is your personal background and experience related to this article?
questions.inspiration: What inspired you to start your business or become involved in this industry?
questions.challenges: What challenges or obstacles have you faced in your career or business, and how have you overcome them?
questions.uniquePerspective: What sets you apart from others in your industry, and what unique perspective do you bring to this article?
questions.highlights: What are some notable career highlights? (Awards, recognition, accomplishments, etc.)
questions.anecdotes: Do you have any personal anecdotes or stories that you would like to include in this article?
questions.futureVision: Where do you see yourself/your brand in a few years? What are some of your dreams and aspirations?
questions.additionalInfo: Is there anything else that you think the writer should know in order to create an effective and successful article?

questions.goal: What is the main goal of this article? (e.g. to increase brand awareness, to drive traffic to a website, to generate leads)
questions.targetAudience: Who is the target audience for this content piece? (e.g. age range, location, interests, job titles, industry beginners, enthusiasts)
questions.message: What is the main message or theme you want in this article?
questions.points: What specific points or information do you want to include in this article?
questions.seoKeywords: Are there any specific SEO keywords or phrases that you want to focus on in this article?
questions.tone: Are there any specific tone or style guidelines that you want the writer to follow? (if yes, please provide details)
questions.socialLinks: Please provide direct links to all social media accounts (if any) you want to be included in the articles.
questions.references: Are there any existing content pieces (e.g. blog posts, articles) that you want the writer to reference or link to in this article?
questions.titles: Provide 2 to 3 potential title ideas if you'd like.
questions.exclusions: Is there information you do NOT want to be included in the article? (if yes, please provide details)

upload.title: Document Upload (Optional)
upload.label: Upload supporting documents
upload.hint: Accepted formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, JPG, PNG

form.success: Questionnaire submitted successfully! Redirecting to article generation...
form.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields

mySubmissions.subtitle: View all your AI-generated article submissions and their status
mySubmissions.noSubmissionsDesc: You haven't submitted any AI-generated articles yet.
